content:
Setting up automatic payments from your bank account can indeed help you qualify for a discount with Progressive.

Progressive offers an **Automatic Payment Discount**, also known as an **EFT (Electronic Funds Transfer) Discount**, to policyholders who set up automatic payments from their bank account. This discount is usually a percentage of your premium, typically around 3-5%.

By setting up automatic payments, you'll ensure that your premiums are paid on time, and you'll avoid late payment fees. Plus, you'll earn a discount on your premium!

To qualify for the Automatic Payment Discount, you'll need to:

1. Set up automatic payments from your bank account using Electronic Funds Transfer (EFT).
2. Ensure that your payments are made on time, as scheduled.

Keep in mind that the Automatic Payment Discount might not be available in all states, so it's essential to confirm the details with Progressive or a licensed agent.

In addition to the Automatic Payment Discount, you might also be eligible for other discounts, such as:

* **Paperless Discount:** By opting for paperless documents and communications, you can earn a discount on your premium.
* **Online Discount:** If you manage your policy online and opt for electronic documents, you might be eligible for a discount.

When you get a quote from Progressive or a licensed agent, be sure to ask about these discounts and confirm your eligibility.
